content: There’s a long history of women from Russia and Ukraine marrying American guys for money and for an opportunity for their children to grow up in a more financially stable place. Even now: https://www.google.com/search?q=russian+bride&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8 On top of that one has to expect that when there’s an ugly rich guy with a beautiful wife, or an older guy with a much younger wife, or both, there’s something going on besides a love match.
